Controls:

Esc   -   Pause

R   -   Restart

Mouse    -   Play the whole game

If you keep dying don't worry. Game is made hard as heck intentionally. All though everything is tested and multiple building paths works towards your eternal victory. Don't expect to beat the game in your first 10 runs.

Lex

Is a simple 2D game made by two guys under a name of "Nusoreseium Games"

I don't want to speak much about our game because our in game tutorial already does a really great job at explaining the core game idea.
